title: Whats the biggest lie in league of legends?
body:
Im a smurf

edit: logged in to it saying 80 comments. didnt think this would get this much attention. we actually hit the front page of the boards. thanks.

replies.body: "Average queue time X minutes"
I don't own any support champions on this account
{{champion:17}} Only support you'll ever need

> [{quoted}](name=Elias1724,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jaHEAq2i,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-12-21T00:30:32.629+0000)
>
> When Riot says they don't favor certain champions.

But they don't because they said so.  It must be true shouldn't it? 

_Sees Zed buffs in combination with the AD DFG item_

http://memecrunch.com/meme/1TTA1/looks-fine-to-me/image.jpg?w=400&c=1
"I have read and accept the terms and conditions."
ao shin

"I'm good let me mid!" - Every feeder ever
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
"free to play"
"I'm lagging" immediately after they die and give first blood
I always feel awkward when I genuinely lag at a critical moment and die because of it, because I know that if I say that I'm lagging everyone will simply assume I'm lying :/

Like every team fight when everyone's casting at the same time. And I'm just walking back down lane like yup not dying for unknown reasons today. And then the team gets mad at me. So I just stick to Rammus, Press W and R and hope to stay alive. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
I never lie about lag. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
You're the hero solo queue needs, but does not deserve {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Press "D" to Dance. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
F to Fly.
Alt + F4 to win

> [{quoted}](name=bobbery5,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jaHEAq2i,comment-id=001200000000,timestamp=2015-12-21T03:00:09.519+0000)
>
> Alt + F4 to win

Nooo that's how you duplicate dropped items in Runescape, remember? ;)
"Come gank free kill."
But it's a free kill. Just to the wrong team.

Lee Sin falls off lategame

*100-0 squishy while off-tank*
"Balance"

"mid or feed"

*gets mid and feeds anyway*
{{champion:59}}  "Jarvan creates a circle of "impassible" terrain"
Ao Shin will be released soon.
The difficulty ratings of champions.

"Gg"
 has it ever been gg to the people that say that????

99% of times people say GG are either:
1. Someone giving up first blood in the first 5 minutes.
2. A legitimately good game, often those 50 minute games that are back and forth that you get really invested in.

I say gg after every game, almost without fail.

Just habit i guess.
"don't feed and ill carry"
the cake.
"Ok, look. We both said a lot of things that you're going to regret, but I think we can put our differences behind us. For science. You monster."
The game is balanced around overall statistics taken from many different levels of play, not just Professional stages.

"It's the support's fault" 
And
"It's the jungler's fault"
Biggest lie? The idea that toxic players are truly being delt with by riot staff.
I won't spend any money on this game.

League takes less skill than Dota 2.

Honestly, I gave up league and am now playing Dota. What IS harder is Dota's learning curve. There is so much you have to learn to get better at the game, but in essence, both games take a good amount of skill to master.
Then why are you on a league forum? Just curious

> [{quoted}](name=1nuD0g,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jaHEAq2i,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-12-21T02:45:50.270+0000)
>
> Then why are you on a league forum? Just curious

Same reason I stayed on the bungie forums for a while after I didn't buy destiny. People are kewl

EDIT: also, memes and games is always fun to read

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

"GG"
no it is typed "ff"

"Warding is the supports job, not mine"

_God damn, lee is setting up a camp top lane!_  _**/all GG, no ganks shit jungler**_
{{champion:1}} : "I never play with matches."
"You will remember Yorick Mori"
Vayne has a bad early game.
Death Recap
kalista is a balanced champion
she is...

You didn't finish the sentence.  

She is...outrageously toxic to the game with a design so obnoxious and anti-fun that it should never have been greenlit, especially considering during her creation stage, mobility creep was apparently "on the radar."   Sure it was.
Unfun to face =/= unbalanced.
